ayahs.textUthmani: وَدَخَلَ جَنَّتَهُۥ وَهُوَ ظَالِمٌ لِّنَفْسِهِۦ قَالَ مَآ أَظُنُّ أَن تَبِيدَ هَـٰذِهِۦٓ أَبَدًا
ayahs.wordByWord: وَدَخَلَ [And he entered] جَنَّتَهُۥ [his garden] وَهُوَ [while he] ظَالِمٌۭ [(was) unjust] لِّنَفْسِهِۦ [to himself] قَالَ [He said] مَآ [Not] أَظُنُّ [I think] أَن [that] تَبِيدَ [will perish] هَـٰذِهِۦٓ [this] أَبَدًۭا [ever]
ayahs.transliteration: Wadakhala jannatahu wahuwa thalimunlinafsihi qala ma athunnu an tabeedahathihi abada

ayahs.textUthmani: وَمَآ أَظُنُّ ٱلسَّاعَةَ قَآئِمَةً وَلَئِن رُّدِدتُّ إِلَىٰ رَبِّى لَأَجِدَنَّ خَيْرًا مِّنْهَا مُنقَلَبًا
ayahs.wordByWord: وَمَآ [And not] أَظُنُّ [I think] ٱلسَّاعَةَ [the Hour] قَآئِمَةًۭ [will occur] وَلَئِن [And if] رُّدِدتُّ [I am brought back] إِلَىٰ [to] رَبِّى [my Lord] لَأَجِدَنَّ [I will surely find] خَيْرًۭا [better] مِّنْهَا [than this] مُنقَلَبًۭا [(as) a return]
ayahs.transliteration: Wama athunnu assaAAataqa-imatan wala-in rudidtu ila rabbee laajidannakhayran minha munqalaba

ayahs.textUthmani: قَالَ لَهُۥ صَاحِبُهُۥ وَهُوَ يُحَاوِرُهُۥٓ أَكَفَرْتَ بِٱلَّذِى خَلَقَكَ مِن تُرَابٍ ثُمَّ مِن نُّطْفَةٍ ثُمَّ سَوَّىٰكَ رَجُلًا
ayahs.wordByWord: قَالَ [Said] لَهُۥ [to him] صَاحِبُهُۥ [his companion] وَهُوَ [while he] يُحَاوِرُهُۥٓ [was talking to him] أَكَفَرْتَ [Do you disbelieve] بِٱلَّذِى [in One Who] خَلَقَكَ [created you] مِن [from] تُرَابٍۢ [dust] ثُمَّ [then] مِن [from] نُّطْفَةٍۢ [a minute quantity of semen] ثُمَّ [then] سَوَّىٰكَ [fashioned you] رَجُلًۭا [(into) a man]
ayahs.transliteration: Qala lahu sahibuhu wahuwa yuhawiruhuakafarta billathee khalaqaka min turabinthumma min nutfatin thumma sawwaka rajula

ayahs.textUthmani: لَّـٰكِنَّا۠ هُوَ ٱللَّهُ رَبِّى وَلَآ أُشْرِكُ بِرَبِّىٓ أَحَدًا
ayahs.wordByWord: لَّـٰكِنَّا۠ [But as for me] هُوَ [He] ٱللَّهُ [(is) Allah] رَبِّى [my Lord] وَلَآ [and not] أُشْرِكُ [I associate] بِرَبِّىٓ [with my Lord] أَحَدًۭا [anyone]
ayahs.transliteration: Lakinna huwa Allahu rabbee walaoshriku birabbee ahada

ayahs.textUthmani: وَلَوْلَآ إِذْ دَخَلْتَ جَنَّتَكَ قُلْتَ مَا شَآءَ ٱللَّهُ لَا قُوَّةَ إِلَّا بِٱللَّهِ ۚ إِن تَرَنِ أَنَا۠ أَقَلَّ مِنكَ مَالًا وَوَلَدًا
ayahs.wordByWord: وَلَوْلَآ [And why (did you) not] إِذْ [when] دَخَلْتَ [you entered] جَنَّتَكَ [your garden] قُلْتَ [say] مَا [What] شَآءَ [wills] ٱللَّهُ [Allah] لَا [(there is) no] قُوَّةَ [power] إِلَّا [except] بِٱللَّهِ ۚ [with Allah] إِن [If] تَرَنِ [you see me] أَنَا۠ [(me)] أَقَلَّ [lesser] مِنكَ [than you] مَالًۭا [(in) wealth] وَوَلَدًۭا [and children]
ayahs.transliteration: Walawla ith dakhalta jannatakaqulta ma shaa Allahu la quwwata illabillahi in tarani ana aqalla minka malanwawalada

ayahs.textUthmani: فَعَسَىٰ رَبِّىٓ أَن يُؤْتِيَنِ خَيْرًا مِّن جَنَّتِكَ وَيُرْسِلَ عَلَيْهَا حُسْبَانًا مِّنَ ٱلسَّمَآءِ فَتُصْبِحَ صَعِيدًا زَلَقًا
ayahs.wordByWord: فَعَسَىٰ [It may be] رَبِّىٓ [that my Lord] أَن [that my Lord] يُؤْتِيَنِ [will give me] خَيْرًۭا [better] مِّن [than] جَنَّتِكَ [your garden] وَيُرْسِلَ [and will send] عَلَيْهَا [upon it] حُسْبَانًۭا [a calamity] مِّنَ [from] ٱلسَّمَآءِ [the sky] فَتُصْبِحَ [then it will become] صَعِيدًۭا [ground] زَلَقًا [slippery]
ayahs.transliteration: FaAAasa rabbee an yu/tiyani khayranmin jannatika wayursila AAalayha husbananmina assama-i fatusbiha saAAeedanzalaqa

ayahs.textUthmani: أَوْ يُصْبِحَ مَآؤُهَا غَوْرًا فَلَن تَسْتَطِيعَ لَهُۥ طَلَبًا
ayahs.wordByWord: أَوْ [Or] يُصْبِحَ [will become] مَآؤُهَا [its water] غَوْرًۭا [sunken] فَلَن [so never] تَسْتَطِيعَ [you will be able] لَهُۥ [to find it] طَلَبًۭا [to find it]
ayahs.transliteration: Aw yusbiha maohaghawran falan tastateeAAa lahu talaba

ayahs.textUthmani: وَأُحِيطَ بِثَمَرِهِۦ فَأَصْبَحَ يُقَلِّبُ كَفَّيْهِ عَلَىٰ مَآ أَنفَقَ فِيهَا وَهِىَ خَاوِيَةٌ عَلَىٰ عُرُوشِهَا وَيَقُولُ يَـٰلَيْتَنِى لَمْ أُشْرِكْ بِرَبِّىٓ أَحَدًا
ayahs.wordByWord: وَأُحِيطَ [And were surrounded] بِثَمَرِهِۦ [his fruits] فَأَصْبَحَ [so he began] يُقَلِّبُ [twisting] كَفَّيْهِ [his hands] عَلَىٰ [over] مَآ [what] أَنفَقَ [he (had) spent] فِيهَا [on it] وَهِىَ [while it (had)] خَاوِيَةٌ [collapsed] عَلَىٰ [on] عُرُوشِهَا [its trellises] وَيَقُولُ [and he said] يَـٰلَيْتَنِى [Oh! I wish] لَمْ [I had not associated] أُشْرِكْ [I had not associated] بِرَبِّىٓ [with my Lord] أَحَدًۭا [anyone]
ayahs.transliteration: Waoheeta bithamarihi faasbahayuqallibu kaffayhi AAala ma anfaqa feehawahiya khawiyatun AAala AAurooshihawayaqoolu ya laytanee lam oshrik birabbee ahada

ayahs.textUthmani: وَلَمْ تَكُن لَّهُۥ فِئَةٌ يَنصُرُونَهُۥ مِن دُونِ ٱللَّهِ وَمَا كَانَ مُنتَصِرًا
ayahs.wordByWord: وَلَمْ [And not] تَكُن [was] لَّهُۥ [for him] فِئَةٌۭ [a group] يَنصُرُونَهُۥ [(to) help him] مِن [other than] دُونِ [other than] ٱللَّهِ [Allah] وَمَا [and not] كَانَ [was] مُنتَصِرًا [(he) supported]
ayahs.transliteration: Walam takun lahu fi-atun yansuroonahumin dooni Allahi wama kana muntasira

ayahs.textUthmani: هُنَالِكَ ٱلْوَلَـٰيَةُ لِلَّهِ ٱلْحَقِّ ۚ هُوَ خَيْرٌ ثَوَابًا وَخَيْرٌ عُقْبًا
ayahs.wordByWord: هُنَالِكَ [There] ٱلْوَلَـٰيَةُ [the protection] لِلَّهِ [(is) from Allah] ٱلْحَقِّ ۚ [the True] هُوَ [He] خَيْرٌۭ [(is the) best] ثَوَابًۭا [(to) reward] وَخَيْرٌ [and (the) best] عُقْبًۭا [(for) the final end]
ayahs.transliteration: Hunalika alwalayatu lillahialhaqqi huwa khayrun thawaban wakhayrun AAuqba

ayahs.textUthmani: وَٱضْرِبْ لَهُم مَّثَلَ ٱلْحَيَوٰةِ ٱلدُّنْيَا كَمَآءٍ أَنزَلْنَـٰهُ مِنَ ٱلسَّمَآءِ فَٱخْتَلَطَ بِهِۦ نَبَاتُ ٱلْأَرْضِ فَأَصْبَحَ هَشِيمًا تَذْرُوهُ ٱلرِّيَـٰحُ ۗ وَكَانَ ٱللَّهُ عَلَىٰ كُلِّ شَىْءٍ مُّقْتَدِرًا
ayahs.wordByWord: وَٱضْرِبْ [And present] لَهُم [to them] مَّثَلَ [the example] ٱلْحَيَوٰةِ [(of) the life] ٱلدُّنْيَا [(of) the world] كَمَآءٍ [like water] أَنزَلْنَـٰهُ [which We send down] مِنَ [from] ٱلسَّمَآءِ [the sky] فَٱخْتَلَطَ [then mingles] بِهِۦ [with it] نَبَاتُ [(the) vegetation] ٱلْأَرْضِ [(of) the earth] فَأَصْبَحَ [then becomes] هَشِيمًۭا [dry stalks] تَذْرُوهُ [it (is) scattered] ٱلرِّيَـٰحُ ۗ [(by) the winds] وَكَانَ [And Allah] ٱللَّهُ [And Allah] عَلَىٰ [over] كُلِّ [every] شَىْءٍۢ [thing] مُّقْتَدِرًا [(is) All Able]
ayahs.transliteration: Wadrib lahum mathala alhayatiaddunya kama-in anzalnahu mina assama-ifakhtalata bihi nabatu al-ardi faasbahahasheeman tathroohu arriyahu wakanaAllahu AAala kulli shay-in muqtadira
